name: Penalty Soccer
description: Penalty Soccer is a football game with easy rules: save 10 penalties before the striker scores 10. For every victory you qualify to the next level. For each level the game goes faster and your goalkeeper moves slower. Totally there is ten levels. Before the game starts you can choose who to take the penalty and this represents the difficulty level. In total there are eight levels with Keegan being the easiest and Maradona the most difficult.

shot.caption: This is the screen that displays as the game loads
So this is a game of skill and reactions
Simple instructions, save 10 goals before the striker scores 10 goals
The list of strikers contains a lot of names from The English League with Maradonna, the only one of this list who never played for an English club, representing the very Hard level
Choose player 4 and the game starts at Level 4. The ball moves towards the goal, sometimes low, sometimes high, sometimes straight, often curving
Missed it! The first few shots are awkward as the player learns to judge the way the ball moves and diminishes with distance
Straight down the middle and well saved
Whenever 10 saves have been made before the striker has scored 10 goals, the game moves on a level. This is level 8, achieved after around 8 minutes

When Level 8 has been completed the game is over.
There is no level 9.
Responding 'Y' takes the player back to the 'This is a game of speed and reactions' screen
